name: Citygrow
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light switch”
”Alexa, turn off the light switch”
”Alexa, set lightbulb to 60 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Citygrow offers you a full-featured voice control experience for your smart home. With the Citygrow Home Automation skill for Alexa, you can control a wide range of smart appliances from Citygrow such as light switches, dimmers, lightbulbs, outlets, light strips, thermostat, etc. To get started, enable the Citygrow Home Automation skill and link to your Citygrow account and discover your Citygrow smart appliances.
